Euler's number e (dig = 100 000 000)

Distirbution of difference's digits with different values of |p-q|

|p-q|=1 (e.g. p=0, q=1) -> {468.609,{44999715,5002504,0,0,0,0,0,0,4997204,45000577}}
|p-q|=2 (e.g. p=0, q=2) -> {451.391,{39990938,4998872,5000004,0,0,0,0,5000266,4998872,40011048}}
|p-q|=3 (e.g. p=0, q=3) -> {458.281,{39993185,0,5002666,4996472,0,0,5002510,5002666,0,40002501}}
|p-q|=4 (e.g. p=0, q=4) -> {420.188,{39991632,0,0,4998825,4999461,5000314,4998824,0,0,40010944}}
|p-q|=5 (e.g. p=0, q=5) -> {441.359,{39983157,0,0,0,9999139,9998044,0,0,0,40019660}}
